name: UPaperSpriteAtlas
doc: Groups together a set of sprites that will try to share the same texture atlas (allowing them to be combined into a single draw call)

AtlasDescription: Description of this atlas, which shows up in the content browser tooltip
MaxWidth: Maximum atlas page width (single pages might be smaller)
MaxHeight: Maximum atlas page height (single pages might be smaller)
MipCount: Maximum atlas page height (single pages might be smaller)
PaddingType: The type of padding performed on this atlas
Padding: The number of pixels of padding
CompressionSettings: Compression settings to use on atlas texture
Filter: Texture filtering mode when sampling these textures
